commands.name: initialized
commands.description: Sent after the frontend has sent all initialization messages and can resume this worker. This command is required to allow execution in the worker.

commands.name: sendMessageToWorker
commands.description: Send an Inspector Protocol message to be dispatched to a Worker's agents.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: JSON Inspector Protocol message (command) to be dispatched on the backend.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: JSON Inspector Protocol message (response or event) to be dispatched on the frontend.
